Xtreme Jump San Benito



(956) 626-1266



Hours of Operation

Monday 11 AM – 9 PM

Tuesday 11 AM – 9 PM

Wednesday 11 AM – 9 PM

Thursday 11 AM – 9 PM

Friday 11 AM – 11 PM

Saturday 11 AM – 11 PM

Sunday 12 PM – 9 PM

Servicing the following locations

We are located in San Benito, Texas but proudly service Cameron County and Willacy County areas including Harlingen, Brownsville, Weslaco, Mercedes, La Feria, Rio Hondo, Olmito, Los Fresnos, Lyford, Raymondville, and other surrounding areas.

We offer laser tag, trampoline park birthday parties, fundraisers, corporate event team building, & much more

Laser Tag Rules

No Running

No Physical Contact

No Climbing

No Abusive Language

No Persons Under the Influence of Drugs or Alcohol Permitted

Obey Staff at All Times

No blocking vest sensors

Keep both hands on the phaser at all times.

No mishandling of Laser Tag Equipment. (You break it, you buy it)

No food, gum, or drinks allowed in the Laser Tag area.

Players must wear enclosed shoes. Thongs or bare feet are not permitted in the arena.

Xtreme Skate Rules

RULES AND DRESS CODE

XTREME SKATE RULES

Everyone who enters must pay the General admission regardless if they

are skating or not. Parents not skating with their children may spectate

at no charge.

We do not allow outside food or drinks inside building.

No gum chewing allowed.

No tobacco products to be used inside building. (i.e Chewing tobacco,

Cigerettes.)

All quad skates must have toestops or toe plugs to be worn on the

skating floor.

All safety gear must be worn properly and free from defects that could

damage the skating floor.

All food and drinks purchased at our snack bar must be kept in the

designated snack bar area.

XTREME SKATES is not responsible for lost or stolen items.

SKATING FLOOR RULES

No fast skating (unless during a fast Xtreme Special).

No tag playing or chasing allowed at any time.

All skaters must keep moving while out on the floor. No stopping along

the walls at anytime.

All skaters must skate in the regular skating direction unless during an

opposite Xtreme Special.

No more then two people can hold hands at one time. No trains allowed.

Children may not be carried by someone wearing skates.

No Outside food or drinks are allowed. Only Cakes are allowed.

No food or drinks allowed on the skating floor.

All accidents must be reported to the front desk.

Rink Attendant/Supervisors has the final word.

Xtreme Skate

Now at San Benito

Featuring a 14,000-square ft. floor, playing music that’s appropriate for all ages, and even have a special skate floor specifically for kids.

Offering Lessons, Parties, Group Rates & More!

Programs

Fundraising

Xtreme Jump is dedicated to giving back to our community. Host your next fundraiser at Xtreme Jump and we’ll donate a portion of all your guest’s entrance fee to your organization or group.

Find out more!

Facility Rentals

Our trampoline courts are so awesome, you might want to rent the entire park to make a memorable experience. Rent our modern, expansive facility for your next event.

Find out more!

Corporate Events

Xtreme Jump Trampoline Park is the perfect place for your next company event! Whether you want to create a team-building event, have a fun and productive meeting or just get together as a corporate group to have fun and develop stronger bonds, we can help!

Find out more!

Lock-in

Private Lockins $19.99 Per Guest (Minimum of 100) – Great for team building, camaraderie

Monday – Thursday 11 PM to to 3 AM

Friday & Saturday 12 AM to 4 AM

Sunday 11 PM to 3 AM

Find out more!

Attractions

Teen Night

Xtreme Mania is 120 minutes of amazing, active fun for kids ages 12 and up.

Laser Tag

Xtreme Laser Tag is an awesome, interactive game perfect for kids and families!

Toddler Time

Bring your little ones to Xtreme Jump!

Xtreme Dodgeball

The world’s most awesome sport: Ultimate Dodgeball.

Arcade

Xtreme Jump is always updating its Arcade to stay on the cutting edge.

Xtreme Slam

Dunk like a pro with courts that will bounce you 10 feet in the air.
